hero.title: Exchanges
hero.subtitle: Cryptocurrency exchanges that let you buy or trade Monero.

filtersDescription: Start by choosing the situation that matches you. We'll highlight the options on this page that are likely the best fit.

decentralized.title: Decentralized Exchanges
decentralized.description: These options let you trade Monero directly from your own wallet, without a traditional exchange account. They're great if you want more privacy and control.

aggregators.title: Swap Aggregators
aggregators.description: Easiest way to trade crypto for Monero without creating an account. These services compare prices from multiple swap providers and route you to the best option.
aggregators.disclaimer: The aggregator itself doesn't hold your funds, but the service you end up using might still ask you to verify your identity.
aggregators.resourceIntro: For an up-to-date list with details and reviews, you can visit the community resource below:
aggregators.tip: **Tip:** Some Monero wallets have a **built-in exchange** for convenience. Check out the community downloads for options.

centralized.title: Centralized Exchanges
centralized.description: These are the classic exchanges where you create an account, complete ID checks, and can deposit from your crypto wallet, bank or card.

descriptions.basicswapdex: Trade crypto trustlessly with no middleman (atomic swaps).
descriptions.bisq: Peer-to-peer exchange where you trade directly with other people. Supports BTC → XMR swaps.
descriptions.eigenwallet: Highly liquid platform for BTC to XMR atomic swaps. Buying XMR with fiat available in EU only (KYC required).
descriptions.retoswap: Decentralized peer-to-peer exchange built on Monero. Supports fiat, crypto → XMR trades.
descriptions.cyphergoat: Service that finds routes for secure crypto-to-crypto swaps across different providers.
descriptions.orangefren: Beginner-friendly site that lets you compare and make crypto swaps, usually without creating an account.
descriptions.trocador: Aggregator that focuses on privacy-friendly swap routes.
descriptions.bitfinex: Trading platform with a wide range of cryptocurrencies and derivatives.
descriptions.kraken: Well-known exchange with strong fiat support and advanced trading features.
descriptions.kucoin: Popular exchange known for its large selection of altcoins, including Monero.
